mapper.select: select * from project where project_seq in(SELECT project_seq FROM project_member where member_seq = #{member_seq})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project (project_title, project_content, project_status, project_isdelete, member_seq) VALUES(#{project_title},#{project_content},"0","0",#{member_seq})
mapper.update: UPDATE project SET project_title = #{project_title}, project_content = #{project_content}, project_status = #{project_status}, project_isdelete = #{project_isdelete}, project_startdate = #{project_startdate}, project_duedate = #{project_duedate} WHERE project_seq = #{project_seq}
